get.description:
## Perform a Health Check
Endpoint to perform a healthcheck on. This endpoint can primarily be used Docker
to ensure a robust container orchestration and management is in place. Other
services which rely on proper functioning of the API service will not deploy if this
endpoint returns any other HTTP status code except 200 (OK).
Returns:
    HealthCheck: Returns a JSON response with the health status

409.description: Need to wait for pending evaluations

get.description:
List all billing rules (superuser only).
Rules are returned sorted by priority (highest first).

post.description:
Create a new billing rule (superuser only).

Rules are applied in priority order (highest priority first) and the first
matching rule is used. Use priority to control rule precedence.

get.description: Get a specific billing rule by ID (superuser only).

put.description:
Update an existing billing rule (superuser only).

Only provided fields will be updated. Null values will update the field to null.

delete.description:
Delete a billing rule (superuser only).

This permanently removes the rule from the system.

get.description:
Get all available agent types (superuser only).
Returns a list of agent type values that can be used in billing rules.

Get all available wallet types (superuser only).
Returns a list of wallet type values that can be used in billing rules.

403.description: Unauthorized: The user does not have access to evaluate kernels on the specified hardware.

400.description: Bad Request: hardware is not supported or request validation failed.

500.description: Internal Server Error: An unexpected error occurred during kernel evaluation.

503.description: Service unavailable: An unexpected error occurred during document search.
